title: Peppers with tuna and mushrooms
ingredients: ['2 tbsp olive oil', '1 chopped onion', '250g halved or quartered chestnut mushrooms', '1 tbsp wholegrain mustard', 'grated zest of 1 lemon', '1 crushed garlic clove', '4 tbsp dry sherry', '280g jar of roasted red peppers', '185g can tuna', '25g chopped fresh parsley']
